House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00524
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR MANDATORY PHILHEALTH COVERAGE FOR ALL PERSONS WITH DISABILITIES, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7277, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE ꞌMAGNA CARTA FOR PERSONS WITH DISABILITYꞌ, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Mandatory Philhealth Coverage For Pwds Act
ABSTRACT : Includes people with mental mobility, hearing, and visual disability or one million five hundred thousand (1.5 million) households population in the country.
